page.title: 09Shouldham-Village activities
page.content: {Football Club:} Shouldham has had a football club for many years,although recently they have been through a bad patch.They play on the Village Playing Field and their colours are gold and black.This year the shirts have been provided by sponsors.Unfortunately many of the players now come from other villages and will not follow the famous Alf Kirchen of Shouldham,who played for Norwich 1933-34 for Â£4 per week and later Arsenal. {Friends of the School:}Last year this group was formed because it was felt that owing to financial cutbacks the Authority were unable to provide resources for the school.Since its inception the group has raised over Â£700 and provided a colour television, playground marker,educational toys and books.The children also benefitted from a Halloween Party.
